p: The number of dengue cases in bordering countries with endemic transmission was obtained for the whole country in the case of Bolivia and Paraguay ( PAHO, 2018). Given its extension, the number of cases in Brazil was calculated considering only the three southernmost districts that limit with Argentina (Santa Catarina, Rio Grande do Sul and Parana, ( Ministério da Saúde do Brasil, 2017). As information was available at the annual scale in the traditional definition (1 January–31 December), annual cases corresponding to the current year were used (e.g., cases in 2004 for the Year 2004).
